item.title: How can i edit compiler plz help me
item.dc:creator: @s1aped s1aped
item.description:
@s1aped wrote:

Difficulty: 1

Base Source: any

Files included: compile.bat

Assumed knowlege: how to fix the compile error

first go into ure testscape folder or what ever server you use and rightclick compile and click edit delete every thing and replace it with this

@echo off title yourservernamehere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause:

after save and exit and ure finished
